ref_type.description: Type of the event detected, ex. GRB, GW, neutrino

ref_instrument.description: Name of the reference mission or, instrument, ex. Fermi-GBM

ref_ID.description: Trigger ID as reported by the reference instrument, ex. bnYYMMDDFF

reference.description: Key-value pairs to reference notices, circulars, ATel, etc. For notices, the key should be the topic as a string, and the value should be the timestamp of the notice (ex: 'gcn.notices.glowbug.alert':'2023-01-01T03:24:36.0Z'). For circulars the key should be 'gcn.circulars' and the value should be the circular ID (ex: 'gcn.circular':32517)
